function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Workplace settings remain a high-risk environment for SARS-CoV-2 outbreaks","Impact":"Risk to the health and wellbeing of employees, their families, and surrounding communities","Mitigation":"Timely and effective implementation of COVID-19 protective measures","Technologies":"PPE, syndromic surveillance and testing","People":"Employees, their families, surrounding communities","Owner":"Employers"},{"Description":"Rapidly changing nature of COVID-19 management, control, and prevention guidelines","Impact":"Difficulty for employers to implement timely and effective COVID-19 protective measures in the workplace","Mitigation":"Frequent updates and guidance from health authorities","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Employers","Owner":"Health authorities"},{"Description":"Consensus in the literature on the increased effectiveness of combined versus single measures","Impact":"Effectiveness of layered mitigation strategies recommended by national and international health authorities","Mitigation":"Implementation of layered mitigation strategies","Technologies":"Layered mitigation strategies","People":"Health authorities, employers","Owner":"Health authorities"}]}
